text: Helvetia Rugby is a Spanish rugby team based in Seville. The team's name is derived from the insurance company Helvetia that is their main sponsor. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" !Season !Tier !Division !Pos. !Notes |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2007–08 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|4th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2008–09 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|4th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2009–10 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|6th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2010–11 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|6th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2011–12 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|8th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2012–13 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|9th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2013–14 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|4th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2014–15 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|6th | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2015–16 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"| | |} |} \---- *8 seasons in División de Honor B ==External links== *Official website Category:Spanish rugby union teams Category:Sport in Seville Category:Rugby clubs established in 2007 Category:Sports teams in Andalusia
